text: Pearl river may refer to: == In United States == *Pearl River County, a county in the U.S. state of Mississippi. *Pearl River, Louisiana, a town in St. Tammany Parish, Louisiana, United States. *Pearl River, New York, a hamlet and census-designated place in the town of Orangetown, Rockland County, New York, United States. == In China == *Pearl River (China), a river in Southern China.
title: Pearl River
